import sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=''utf-8'', errors=''replace''\)
sys.path.insert\(0, ''C:/Users/valla/Desktop/Offer-Letter-Compliance-Checker-Real-time-/python-nlp''\)

print\(''='' * 60\)
print\(''COMPLIANCE CHECKER FULL SYSTEM TEST''\)
print\(''='' * 60\)

# Test 1: Ollama Connection
print\(''\\n[1/4] Testing Ollama + Phi-3 Connection...''\)
from compliance_v2.llm_service import LLMService
llm = LLMService\(\)
status = llm.get_status\(\)
if status[''available'']:
    print\(''   OK - Ollama running with'', status[''model'']\)
else:
    print\(''   FAIL - Ollama not available''\)

# Test 2: RAG Database
print\(''\\n[2/4] Testing RAG Database...''\)
from compliance_v2.rag_service import RAGService
rag = RAGService\(\)
print\(''   OK - RAG service initialized''\)

# Test 3: Load State Laws
print\(''\\n[3/4] Loading California Laws...''\)
try:
    rag.load_state_laws\(''CA''\)
    laws = rag.search\(''non-compete agreement'', state=''CA'', top_k=3\)
    print\(f''   OK - Loaded CA laws, found {len\(laws\)} relevant matches''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''   Warning - {e}''\)

# Test 4: Full Analysis
print\(''\\n[4/4] Running Full Compliance Analysis...''\)
print\(''   \(This may take 30-60 seconds\)''\)

test_letter = ''''''
Dear Candidate,

We offer you the position of Software Engineer with a salary of 85000 per year.

As a condition of employment, you agree to a 2-year non-compete clause 
preventing you from working for any competitor.

This is at-will employment. Please provide your salary history.
''''''

response = llm.generate\(''''''Analyze this California offer letter for compliance issues:

""""""'''''' + test_letter + ''''''""""""

STATE: CA

Return JSON: {""violations"": [{""severity"": ""error/warning/info"", ""issue"": ""description""}]}
'''''', max_new_tokens=512\)

print\(''\\n'' + ''='' * 60\)
print\(''LLM ANALYSIS RESULT''\)
print\(''='' * 60\)
print\(response.encode\(''ascii'', ''replace''\).decode\(''ascii''\)\)

print\(''\\n'' + ''='' * 60\)
print\(''ALL SYSTEMS OPERATIONAL''\)
print\(''='' * 60\)
")
